title: Conversational Jazz: Making Abstract Expressionistic Communication w/ Artist & Musician Chris Petkau
description:
Karen interviews Chris Petkau of The Chris Show YouTube channel. The contents of this conversation are impossible to describe, but it's a wild ride and well worth the trip:-)

Chris' channel:  https://www.youtube.com/c/ChrisPetkau/videos
The video Chris did of me and Glen: https://youtu.be/pYgUwolDuPs
The video Chris made of my first talk with PVK: https://youtu.be/CDa9SC6CIxU
